metadata.title: CVE-2021-3605 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
There's a flaw in OpenEXR's rleUncompress functionality in versions priorto 3.0.5. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to anapplication linked with OpenEXR could cause an out-of-bounds read. Thegreatest risk from this flaw is to application availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3605` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7').
